lines.gurmukhi: jYsy sis joiq hoq pUrn pRgws qws icqvq ckRq ckor iDAwn Dwr hI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Sasi Joti Hot Pooran Pragaas Taasa , Chitavat Chakrat Chakor Dhiaan Dhaar Hee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a geek partridge is spellbound by the radiation of moonlight and keep on looking at it with rapt attention.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy AMDkwr ibKY dIp hI idpq dyiK Aink pqMg Eq poiq hoie guMjwr hI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Andhakaar Bikhai Deep Hee Dipat Daykhi , Anik Patang Aot Poti Hoi Gounjaar Hee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as countless moths and insects gather around the flame of lamp lighted in dark place.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy imstwn pwn jwn kwj BwNjn mY rwKq hI cItI koit loB luBq Apwr hI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Misataan Paan Jaan Kaaj Bhaanjan Mai , Raakhat Hee Cheetee Koti Lobh Loubhat Apaar Hee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as ants gather around the pot in which some sweet meats have been kept.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy prm inDwn gur igAwn prvwn jwmY skl sMswr qws crn nmskwr hI ]367]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Param Nidhaan Gur Giaan Paravaan Jaamai , Sakal Sansaar Taas Charan Namasakaar Hee ?367?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, the whole world bows at the feet of that Sikh of the Guru who is blessed with the supreme treasure i.e. divine word by the true guru and is well lodged in the heart of the Sikh by perpetual practice. (367)
